OutreachHistory.bodyText: Dear Acme Corporation, This is a friendly reminder about your outstanding balance of $15,750.50. Please arrange payment at your earliest convenience. Best regards, Collections Team
Welcome to our collection process. Please review the attached statement showing your current balance.
Called accounts payable department. Left voicemail requesting callback regarding overdue invoices totaling $32,500.
Second notice regarding outstanding invoices. Please contact us to discuss payment arrangements.
Initial payment reminder sent for invoices approaching past due status.
FINAL NOTICE BEFORE LEGAL ACTION: This letter serves as formal notification that legal proceedings will commence within 7 business days if payment of $45,000 is not received.
Spoke with CFO regarding payment plan options. Customer requested 30-day extension which was denied due to account age.
Urgent payment reminder. Your account is significantly past due and requires immediate attention.
Thank you for your payment of $12,500. Your account is now current. We appreciate your business.
Payment reminder for outstanding invoices. Please process payment or contact us if you have questions.
ESCALATION NOTICE: Your account has been escalated due to non-payment. Please contact our collections department immediately.
Attempted phone contact. No answer. Will retry tomorrow.
Following up on our previous communication. Please review attached statement and arrange payment.
Your account requires immediate attention. Payment of $18,900.50 is now over 60 days past due.
Left message with accounts payable regarding overdue balance.
